ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Did He not find you orphaned and shelter you?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Did He not find you an orphan and take care of you?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Did He not find you an orphan and then gave you shelter?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Did He not find you as an orphan and give you shelter?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Did He not find you an orphan, so provided you shelter?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Did He not find you an orphan and gave you a refuge
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Did He not find you an orphan and give you shelter?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Did He not find thee an orphan, and shelter thee?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Did He not find thee an orphan and protect (thee)?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Did He not find you orphaned and shelter you?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Found He not thee an orphan, so He sheltered thee?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Did He not find you an orphan, and shelter you?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Did He not find thee an orphan and give thee shelter (and care)?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Did He not find you (O Muhammad (Peace be upon him)) an orphan and gave you a refuge?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Did He not find you an orphan and give you shelter?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Did He not find you orphaned, and sheltered you?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Did He not find you an orphan and give [you] refuge?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [93:6] Did He not find you an orphan (an interrogative meant as an affirmative, in other words, He did [indeed] find you [an orphan]), having lost your father before you were born or [shortly] thereafter, and shelter you?, by having your uncle Abū Tālib embrace you [as part of his household].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: Allah then mentioned His blessings upon the Prophet (pbuh) saying (Did He not find thee) O Muhammad (an orphan) without a father or mother (and protect (thee)) and joined you to your uncle Abu Talib and sufficed you your provision? The Prophet (pbuh) said: "Yes, O Gabriel!"
